factoryMessage.restore1Txt: Restoring to factory default and restarting. This page will, after three minutes, automatically attempt to reconnect to this server at the IP address
factoryMessage.restore2Txt: If the connection attempt is unsuccessful, or if the IP address of the Axis Network I/O Audio Module changes after the restart, the connection must be reopened manually. Enter the IP address of the Axis Network I/O Audio Module in the URL field (address bar) in your browser and the port if any.
factoryMessage.restore3Txt: If the connection attempt is unsuccessful, or if the IP address of the Axis Network Video Product changes after the restart, the connection must be reopened manually. Enter the IP address of the Axis Network Video Product in the URL field (address bar) in your browser and the port if any.

factoryMessage2.restore1Txt:
Please wait...restoring all settings to factory default.
The Axis Network I/O Audio Module will restart and since DHCP will be activated, the IP address might have changed.
Refer to the installation guide on how to reconnect to the Axis Network I/O Audio Module.
factoryMessage2.restore2Txt:
Please wait...restoring all settings to factory default.
The Axis Network Video Product will restart and since DHCP will be activated, the IP address might have changed.
Refer to the installation guide on how to reconnect to the Axis Network Video Product.

maintenance.restart2Alert: will take a few minutes. Are you sure you want to restart?
maintenance.restore1Alert: This will restore all server settings, except the IP address, HTTP port and focus settings, to their default values.
maintenance.sureCont: Are you sure you want to continue?
maintenance.restore2Alert: This will restore all server settings, except the IP address and HTTP port, to their default values.
maintenance.hardFactDefAlert: This will restore all server settings to their default values.
maintenance.langAlert:
This firmware upgrade may require an upgrade of the language file for your language.
Continue firmware upload?
maintenance.calibConfirm:
Warning! Focus and Zoom will be reset to default positions and must be reconfigured.
Are you sure you want to continue?
maintenance.calFailTxt: Calibrating: Failed! See the log for more info.
maintenance.ledFlDurAlrt: Invalid LED flash duration. Enter a numeric value between 1 and 60.
maintenance.defBtnStatTxt: Set all parameters to factory default
maintenance.hlpTxt: Click here for help on this page
maintenance.resetAllParamATxt: Resets all parameters, except the IP and focus parameters, to the original factory settings.
maintenance.resetAllParamBTxt: Resets all parameters, except the IP parameters, to the original factory settings.
maintenance.factDefAllParamTxt: Resets all parameters to the original factory settings.
maintenance.testMecCam2Txt: mechanics and camera for possible errors.
maintenance.calibPTZTxt: Calibrate the PTZ mechanics and camera.
maintenance.specFrimTxt: Specify the firmware to upgrade to:
maintenance.noteTxt: Note: Do not disconnect power to the unit during the upgrade. The unit restarts automatically after the upgrade has completed. (1-10 minutes.)

restartMessage.info1Txt: Restarting. This page will, in a few minutes, automatically attempt to reconnect to this server at the IP address
restartMessage.info2Txt: If the connection attempt is unsuccessful, or if the IP address of the Axis Network I/O Audio Module changes after the restart, the connection must be reopened manually. Enter the IP address of the Axis Network I/O Audio Module in the URL field (address bar) in your browser.
restartMessage.info3Txt: If the connection attempt is unsuccessful, or if the IP address of the Axis Network Video Product changes after the restart, the connection must be reopened manually. Enter the IP address of the Axis Network Video Product in the URL field (address bar) in your browser.

upgradeMessage.msgTxt:
The system is about to be upgraded.
Please wait.
